#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	map <string, int> m1;
	//map <int, string> m2;
	int m,c=1,n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n--) {
		string str;
		scanf("\n");
		cin>>str;
		m1[str]++;
		if(m1[str]==c) {
			printf("%d ",c);
			cout<<str<<endl;
			c++;
		}
	}
	/*map <int, string>:: iterator it;
	for(it=m2.begin();it!=m2.end();it++) {
		cout<<it->first<<" "<<it->second<<endl;
	}*/
	return 0;
}
